tspan.tspan: Casing applied to surface of jamb, on both
.75" jamb is shimmed .5" away from framing
trimmer because of the hallway width. HD
pocket door design expects .25". Will the HD
pocket door design allow this adjustment?
wall surface of pocket door header.
Joins 1" top casing on hallway side.
Rough opening for HD pocket door frame is 73".
